arts.ttl: Dundee United vs Hearts predictions: Goodwin's Terrors to find Jambos tough
arts.sum: Dundee United head to Tynecastle to take on a bang in-form Hearts side and Ian Wilkerson believes that the Jambos will extend their winning run to 10 matches.

arts.ttl: Rangers vs Dundee predictions: Gers to sink the Dark Blues
arts.sum: James Mason is expecting a routine victory for Rangers when they welcome Dundee to Ibrox for Scottish Premiership action on Saturday.
